Hero.title: Transparent Pricing
Hero.description: Quality barbering services at fair prices. No hidden fees, just exceptional craftsmanship.

Highlights.description: Experience our signature services with master barbers who bring years of expertise to every cut.
Indulge in traditional barbering with our hot towel shaves and beard grooming services.
Save more with our exclusive packages designed for families and regular clients.

offers.title: Student Discount

featured.title: Professional Quality

Hero.title: Move freely with Beam
Hero.description: Change the future starting with yourself by using Beam now.

Feature.title: Group Travel
Feature.description: Enjoy exciting trips with friends and family using the Group Travel feature, where you can ride together using a single account. This feature is available in select cities.

Help.title: Still have questions?
Help.description: If you want to learn more about Beam or are interested in partnering with us, we are happy to assist you. Contact us now and let's create something great together.

Mission.text1: We have a mission to turn small journeys into better journeys, and

Priority.title: Sustainability
Priority.description: Beam is the only operator in the Asia-Pacific with Climate Neutral Certification. And because we‚Äôre committed to going further, we‚Äôre determined to achieve Carbon Negative by 2025.

Vehicle.title: Vehicles
Vehicle.description: Our electric scooters and bikes, designed for sharing, provide a comfortable and reliable riding experience tailored to your daily needs.

News.title: Latest News
News.description: Stay updated with the latest news and exciting updates about our city, community, and programs.

news.description: Beam accelerates growth with a 36% surge in gross revenue, achieving adjusted EBITDA profitability.
Beam initiates pedestrian shield technology integration.

Partnership.title: Reimagining your city.
Partnership.description: We want to partner with you to drive something new today.

partnerships.title: Collaborating, with cities
partnerships.subtitle: We are fully committed to partnering with governments at all levels to make city life work better for everyone.

partnerships.title: Partnering, with us
partnerships.subtitle: Wherever we operate, we strive to grow our operations through collaboration with local communities.

partnerships.title: Beam safety academy
partnerships.subtitle: We work hard to ensure every Beam user is mindful of the riding environment and uses shared city spaces responsibly.

VehicleSafety.desc1: For us, safety is not just about vehicles but also about riders, pedestrians, and the communities we pass through. Our technology ensures maximum safety for everyone.
VehicleSafety.desc2: In Asia Pacific, Beam is the only Climate Neutral Certified electric mobility operator. We continuously work to reduce our carbon footprint for a greener future.
VehicleSafety.desc3: Our #BeamBooster platform leverages technology and location data to connect users with local businesses, helping to increase their revenue.
VehicleSafety.desc4: Our Beam Marshals program creates job opportunities in local communities, providing additional income and supporting the regional economy.
VehicleSafety.desc5: We believe that data is key to better city planning. Our data helps governments design more efficient infrastructure.

Hero.title: City
Hero.description: Beam is a global leader in micromobility, operating electric bikes, scooters, and mopeds in over 60 cities across Asia Pacific.

Help.title: Want Beam in your city?
Help.description: Are you a local or city government official who wants to learn more about how shared micromobility systems can be implemented in your city?

DownloadPage.title: Get Started with Beam
DownloadPage.description: Find, unlock, and ride Beam in a nearby city. Depart within minutes, easy and quick. Available on iOS and Android.

Benefit.title: Our Benefits
Benefit.description: At Beam, we are fully committed to collaborating with organizations of all types and sizes to make urban life better for everyone.

quotes.quote: #BeamBooster is a smart initiative using Beam electric scooters to bring more people to our doors. We are thrilled to be involved.
quotes.author: Helen Rutherford

quotes.quote: This program has helped increase daily visitors to our store. The Beam scooters are eye-catching, and we‚Äôve seen a positive impact.
quotes.author: Jane Smith

quotes.quote: We were highly impressed with the direct impact of #BeamBooster. This is a brilliant innovation supporting local businesses like ours.
quotes.author: Michael Brown
